AnimatePanel - Class in SimulationFramework
AnimatePanel is the GUI component of the simulation framework package.
AnimatePanel(SimFrame, String) - Constructor for class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
Make an AnimatePanel
animatePanel - Variable in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
GUI container for animation of model
appFrame - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
reference to simulation's main class
authorItem - Variable in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame

B

bot - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
hold all the bots
Bot - Class in SimulationFramework
Bot is an abstract class for any "player" or "robot" subclass that will be controlled by a path-finding and/or moving algorithm().
Bot(String, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class SimulationFramework.Bot
Make a Bot
Bot(String, Point, Color) - Constructor for class SimulationFramework.Bot
Make a Bot
box - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel

Connector - Class in SimulationFramework
Connector is used to draw lines between points on the simulation's canvas.
Connector(int, int, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class SimulationFramework.Connector
Make a Connector using screen positions
Connector(Point, Point, Color) - Constructor for class SimulationFramework.Connector

D

delay() - Method in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
When simulation model is valid (simValid is true) repaint() the display to show the current simulation state and "step" the simulation by having the simulation thread wait AnimatePanel.delayInterval milliseconds.
delayInitial - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
default animation speed 1 fps
delayInterval - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
current milliseconds to "sleep" between animation frames
delayMax - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
slowest animation speed 1 frame every 5 seconds
delayMin - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
fastest animation speed 25 fps
delayStep - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
increment "ticks" between slider values
draw(Graphics) - Method in class SimulationFramework.Bot
Draw the bot for the current simulation step.
draw(Graphics) - Method in class SimulationFramework.Connector

draw(Graphics) - Method in interface SimulationFramework.Drawable
 
draw(Graphics) - Method in class SimulationFramework.Marker

Drawable - Interface in SimulationFramework
Drawable interfaces must implement public Draw(Graphics G).
drawDrawables(Graphics, ArrayList<Drawable>) - Method in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel

drawLabel - Variable in class SimulationFramework.Marker

SimFrame - Class in SimulationFramework
SimFrame is an abstract class for the framework's GUI.
SimFrame(String, String) - Constructor for class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
Make the Frame
simRunning - Variable in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
true if simulation is running, paused model can start back up
simulateAlgorithm() - Method in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
This method is a "callback" from AnimatePanel so the application can stop/start, clear, and reset the execution of an algorithm (like: path finding).
SimulationFramework - package SimulationFramework
 
simValid - Variable in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
true if model has been setup -- simulation can be "re-run"
size - Variable in class SimulationFramework.Marker
marker's size
slider - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
control the speed of the simulation's animation
start - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
start the simulation running with current model
start() - Method in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
Facilitate settimg up the model in the simulation's main class (a subclass of SimFrame).
startTime - Variable in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
Used to time algorithm performance at millisecond level
see getAlgoTime()
status - Variable in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
information displayed at the bottom of the frame
stop - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
stop the simulation running with current model
stopWait() - Method in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
When simulation model has been reset (simValid is false) there are two wait stages for the simulation thread pass.
